examplePhrases: Alexa tell patriot to start watching TV
Alexa tell patriot to turn on kitchen light when I am cooking dinner
en-US.name: Patriot
en-US.description: Interactively define and control Patriot IoT home devices using activity names

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Create one or more Patriot IoT devices, then control it by saying Alexa, tell patriot to turn on my device when I am testing. Then tell Alexa to discover devices, followed by Alexa begin testing.
